availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William P Elliston (Grant County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Elliston. Father of Sarah H. Elliston, James N. Elliston, William D. Elliston, Canrobert Elliston, and Nancy J. Elliston. Merchant in Grant County, Kentucky in 1860. Employed William Dance as a farm laborer in Grant County in 1860. Employed Bernecia Lyons as a domestic in Grant County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grant County, p. 892.
Find A Grave, "W.P. Elliston (Dec 14, 1825-Oct 24, 1894)," Memorial #13383302, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/13383302 (accessed May 6, 2020).
